summary: The profiling package supplies commandâ€‘line tools that run the TLO simulation within a profiling session, gather runtime, memory, and disk I/O statistics, log execution details, and store configuration and performance results for later analysis. Shared utilities provide progress logging, checksum generation, population snapshot persistence, and scheduling of periodic profiling events.
business_intent: Enable systematic performance measurement and analysis of the simulation to detect bottlenecks, support scaling studies, and improve resource efficiency.
